sentence.Network_en: Once it happened that a Sufi was brought to me.

sentence.Network_en: The depth of Sufi mysticism arouses fear among orthodox Muslims, generating hostile criticism.

entry.tran: 苏非派信徒(信奉非常虔诚的伊斯兰教派苏非派)
entry.def: A Sufi is a member of a very spiritual group of Muslims.

means.word_mean: 1. a Muslim who represents the mystical dimension of Islam; a Muslim who seeks direct experience of Allah; mainly in Iran
1. of or relating to the Sufis or to Sufism
